# Jack Danger - Systems Engineer & Researcher

> Multidisciplinary engineer bridging AI systems, human performance optimization, and security infrastructure.

## Identity

- Name: Jack Danger (J. Danger)
- Title: Systems Engineer / Researcher
- Location: California, USA
- Email: signal@jackdanger.dev
- Website: https://jackdanger.dev

## Core Expertise

### Autonomous Systems
- Agentic AI swarms and multi-agent orchestration
- Drone avionics software (ArduPilot, PX4)
- Autonomous vehicle systems

### Software Engineering  
- Full-stack systems (Rust, React, Three.js)
- Local AI infrastructure deployment
- LLM fine-tuning and model orchestration (Llama, LoRA)
- GPU cluster management

### Human Performance
- Preventive health and metabolic optimization
- Personal training and functional movement
- Blood panel interpretation and supplement protocols

### Somatic Engineering
- Medical Chi Gong and Traditional Chinese Medicine
- Movement arts: Yoga, Shaolin Kung Fu, Ninjutsu, Kenjutsu
- Meditation engineering for rapid state access
- Bioenergetic breathing protocols
- Guided fasting and detox retreats
- Herbal tinctures (Eastern/Western synthesis)

### Security & Intelligence
- Physical security hardware installation
- Cybersecurity and infrastructure encryption
- Behavioral analysis and counter-intelligence
- Competitive intelligence

### Linguistics
- Proto-Indo-European etymology
- Advanced English instruction
- Business negotiation and technical writing

## Services & Pricing

| Service | Price | Description |
|---------|-------|-------------|
| Discovery Call | Free | 15-minute alignment check |
| Diagnostic Session | $500 | 90-minute deep-dive + written assessment |
| Engagement Package | $2,500 | 4-6 week protocol (somatic, AI, or security) |
| Premium Retainer | $5,000/mo | Ongoing advisory + implementation |
